title: 25. More Than Just a Light: The Benefits, Misconceptions, Mistakes + Must-Knows of LED with Concepts Institute's Michele Phelan.
description:
Hi Roomies, in this episode, I'm chatting with the founder of Concepts Institute of Advanced Esthetics, Michele Phelan. 

Michele Phelan has been a licensed, practicing esthetician for over 30 years. She has taught esthetics at every level including; State Board, clinical/medical and CIDESCO. Michele writes the core curriculum and teaches the Clinical esthetics portion of our innovative and highly advanced program. Michele holds a B.A. Business Administration from SFSU and is also a certified nutrition coach.

Take a class with Michele or learn more:

https://conceptsinstitute.com

Connect with Michele on IG:

@conceptsinstitute

@educatedesthies

In this episode we talk:

- what light therapy (LED) truly is

- benefits of LED

- wavelengths + what conditions they are used for 

- how to choose a legitimate device manufacturer

- some common misconceptions around light therapy and mistakes eties might be making

- why light therapy elevates your business

Love you! Thanks for listening with us. Let me know what you thought of the episode on social media!

Shop my Glymed Store
